values.text: If you have life insurance, it's a good idea to regularly review the cover to make sure it’s right for you and your family circumstances. If you review your cover and find it lacking, you can either ask your current insurer to increase the scope of your protection, or cancel your policy and shop around for another.

1. When you want to port your health insurance policy, you need to approach the new health insurer at least 45-60 days before the expiry of your existing health insurance policy. Once you are there, you need to fill a proposal form for portability, details of previous year policy copies and then apply for portability.

2. As the policyholder of your life insurance policy, you are in control of your life insurance policy choices. Neither beneficiaries nor life insurance policies can be changed without your consent. The only exception to this may be if the beneficiary on your life insurance policy is irrevocable.

You need the following document for life insurance claim:
The death certificate.
Original policy documents.
ID proof of the beneficiary.
Age proof of insurer.
Discharge form (executed and witnessed)
Medical certificate (as proof of the cause of death)
Police FIR (in case of unnatural death)

For health insurance you need the following
Insurance company's claim form, duly filled and signed by you
Discharge card
Written consultation from the doctor with receipts
Your hospital bills, which have to be stamped and signed by the hospital authorities
X-ray films and other test results such as blood test, urine test etc.
Medicine bills
Other relevant documents relating to the cause of treatment
Hello there! How may I help you?

To claim your insurance please fill up the claim form provided by your insurance provider along with a copy of you policy document and supporting documents.

For updating health insurance policyholders need to fill up prescribed reimbursement claim forms. Some sections need to be filled by the hospital and signed by the doctor who treated the patient. The form can be downloaded from the insurer or TPA's website.

If you have recently submitted a claim for your insurance policy or other policies, you can check its status on this check claim status link. On the web page, enter your Intimation number and your ID Card number, and click on 'Get Claim Status'.
Please log in to your insurance provider's website and search with your policy id.  You can also go through your policy document. Please wait till you receive policy document.

Beneficiary for your life insurance policy is the individual who will receive the death benefit in the event of your death. You're not limited to just one person. A policy can have more than one beneficiary. A policy's primary beneficiary is the first person who will receive the benefits of that policy when you die. Call at the customer care helpline of your insurance provider to add beneficiary.

If you feel the policy is not relevant to you please call  or email your insurance service provider with your policy number requesting to guide you through the procedure of cancellation. Please go through the policy document carefully.
Hello. I am Insurance bot. I can help you with your queries on insurance.

name: Covid Detection
description: This chatbot interacts with users and  helps to identify if the User is Covid-19 Infected and how severe his/her condition is
